angle_of_view::title: Angle of View
angle_of_view::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Use a low angle to make your subject look imposing.
angle_of_view::text_card_1::text: Now practice using angles in your photos. Focus on creating unique compositions.
angle_of_view::preview_card_2::header: Effective angles can emphasize action and make your photos “come to life.” (describe the specific use case in chosen photo)
angle_of_view::intro_card_0::headline: Angle of View
angle_of_view::preview_card_0::header: Unique angles create photos with impact. Explore a variety of angles when photographing a character or place.
angle_of_view::text_card_0::text: Create unique photos by altering your angle-of-view. Let’s look at some examples.
angle_of_view::preview_card_1::header: Unique angles can improve your story. In this example a low angle is used to emphasize the character’s isolation.
